amendment.description: To impose sanctions with respect to foreign persons responsible for gross violations of internationally recognized human rights.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4031 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4031 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Cardin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4031 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
